name: Post a publication

testSteps.description: 1: Post a publication ({userId=1, title=saludos, body=saludo a mi comunidad})

children.description: Given the user is connected to the jsonplaceholder API

When sends a POST request to submit its publication with the following information
| userId | title | body |
| 1 | saludos | saludo a mi comunidad |
Johan do post
Johan our post
POST https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts

userStory.storyName: Post a post using jsonplaceholder.typicode.com service
userStory.displayName: Post a post using jsonplaceholder.typicode.com service
userStory.narrative:
As an user on jsonplaceholder.typicode.com platform
  I want to post a post
  So that I can share my experiences

title: Post a publication

values: saludo a mi comunidad desde otro user
saludo a mi comunidad desde el mismo user

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given the user is connected to the jsonplaceholder API
When sends a POST request to submit its publication with the following information
Then should receive a response of 201
And should see the posts with an id generated and the same data

scenarioOutline:
Given the user is connected to the jsonplaceholder API
When sends a POST request to submit its publication with the following information
|userId | title | body|
|<userId> | <title> | <body>|
Then should receive a response of 201
And should see the posts with an id generated and the same data
